activities:
The information collected by Luvata will be used (1) for various administrative and recordkeeping purposes, (2) for the purpose of automating the Luvata Talent Management Process, and (3) to create a database of injuries suffered at work for the purpose of establishing a healthier and safer workplace for employees. The organization is a holding company.
